name: Front-end Developer
description: Improved web application performance by developing highly reusable Vue.JS components, optimizing user experience and reducing page load times.
Enhanced code base quality by implementing TypeScript and adhering to front-end development best practices, resulting in more maintainable code and reduced bugs during development.
Optimized development workflow through maintaining detailed technical documentation and code comments, enabling team members to easily onboard and develop new features.
Improved user interface by developing responsive UI using Vue3 and Bootstrap, ensuring consistent user experience across devices and receiving positive user feedback.

Strengthened team collaboration through proactive communication and coordination with design and back-end teams during feature development, contributing to creating cohesive products that met project requirements.
